aplus_text: From the brand that you love and trust, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee comes to you after going through a 4-stage stringent quality process.Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee is made with Pure Cow Milk, that gives it a natural golden colour.This desi ghee is prepared is by slowly cooking for about 3.5 hours over gradually increased temperatures.The SloCook process gives the ghee its delicious aroma and granular texture which will reminds you of mom's food.Aashirvaad Svasti is Pure Cow Ghee that naturally contains Vitamin A which is known to support immunity.Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee lends itself beautifully to varied Indian dishes.Serves: 4 Cooking time: 60 minIngredients:Carrot - 1kg, Sugar - 500gm, Khova - 500gm, Milk - 1litre, Cashew - 40gm, Raisin - 30gm, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee – 4 tbspPreparation:1. Peel the carrots & grate them. In a pan fry cashews & raisins in 4 tbsp of Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee.2. Now add the grated carrot and sauté for 20 minutes, till the moisture of the carrot dries out.3. Add milk, khova and sugar, cook on medium heat for 30 minutes while stirring continuously till the mixture dries up.4. Gajar ka halwa is now ready to serve.Serves: 4 Cooking time: 45 minIngredients:Pineapple cubes ( small ) - 300gms, Semolina/Rawa - 1 cup, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee - 4 tbsp, Saffron - half a gram, Sugar - 1 cup, Cashew - 6, Raisins - 6, Water - 1½ cupsPreparation:1. Heat 2 tbsp of Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee in a pan and fry the raisins and cashews. Keep aside.2. In a bowl heat water, add the chopped pineapple cubes and saffron. Allow it to cook till it becomes slightly soft.3. Meanwhile, heat 2 tbsp of Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee in a pan and dry roast the rawa till it turns golden brown.4. Now add the water and pineapple mixture to the rawa and keep stirring to ensure no lumps are formed.5. Add sugar and saffron and continue to stir till all the moisture evaporates and the semolina is cooked completely.6. Garnish with raisins & cashews and serve hot.Serves: 4 Cooking time: 45 minIngredients:Rice flour - 2 cups, Gram flour - 1 cup, Pepper powder - ½ tsp, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee - 3 tbsp, Asafoetida - ¼ tsp, Salt - 1/2 tsp, Sesame seeds: 1 tsp, Water as needed to make dough Oil For deep fryingPreparation:1. In a bowl, mix rice flour, gram flour, pepper powder, sesame seeds, salt, asafoetida and Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee.2. Add water as required to make a stiff non sticky dough.3. Take a ribbon murukku mould and keep a ball of dough in the press.4. Use the press directly over hot oil and fry till golden.5. Enjoy ribbon murukku with a hot cup of tea/coffee.
bullets: Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee is a premium ghee made with a special SloCook process  , This desi ghee is prepared by slow cooking it for about 3.5 hours over gradually increased temperatures  , The SloCook process gives the ghee its rich aroma, golden granular texture and consistent quality  , This rich and aromatic Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee naturally contains Vitamin A that is known to support immunity  , Now enhance the aroma and deliciousness of every dish with Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee, which is made with love, in India

aplus_text: HealthOxide Sweet Stevia Drops & Powder are convenient to carry in your pocket or office bag. Natural Sugar Replacement - Zero Calorie. Just 1-2 Drops are equal to one full tea spoon of Sugar & 0.5g powder is equal to 1 table spoon of Sugar. Just reduce the calorie intake to zero and still enjoy the sweetness. As more and more people are becoming increasingly aware about the harmful effects of artificial sweeteners on human health, the demand for zero calorie natural sweeteners has increased. HealthOxide Natural Stevia Sweetener helps you in controlling your calorie intake and keeps you fit. It gives you a natural sweet taste and hence can be a good and a healthy substitute for sugar.Stevia is a gift from Mother Nature which is being used as a sweetener since time immemorial. Leaves of Stevia accumulate sweet tasting diterpene glycosides such as stevioside and rebaudiosides which are sweeter than sucrose. Steviodal glycosides from Stevia help to offer a solution for prevention of complex health problems.HealthOxide Natural Stevia Sweetener drops and powder are ideal for usage in juices, shakes, smoothies, mocktails, cocktails, tea, coffee and other such beverages. It can also be used in desserts to give your tongue a sweet but healthy treat.To naturally sweeten your favorite food and beverages, 1-2 liquid drops of the HealthOxide Sweet Stevia Drops can be used as desired. It is recommended to shake the bottle well before use.Because of the health benefits offered by Stevia, the sweetener is suitable for fitness seekers and weight and health conscious people.

Soaking your feet in a warm water infused with tea tree oil is known to keep away nail infections, especially during monsoon season. Here the anti-fungal properties of this oil are at work. aplus_text: Don't we all crave different things at different times? Dark fudgy chocolate one day, sweet tangy cranberries another day... who knows!?Sometimes all you need is a little bit of everything! Why force your choice, when you can actually have it All. In One. :)It's a myth that only gym-going men need protein.Expecting moms, growing kids, aging dads - they all do! And if they love nuts and dates - they'll love our bars.Other brands hide their ingredients at the back, because they have something to hide.We declare all our ingredients proudly - upfront!Does your bar have Maltodextrin? Or Maltilol? Or FOS (fructo-oligosaccharides)? Why!?Well, we only make real food. With ingredients you can pronounce. Nothing made in a chemistry lab.When others say 'clean label', they mean some of the ingredients are clean.When we say it, we mean ALL ingredients are absolutely clean. That's why only we can declare them all, upfront!When others say 'no added sugar', they usually add some other form of sugar like Maltodextrin, Xylitol, or High Furctose Corn Syrup (ew!).You'll never find shady sugar substitutes in our bars. Only natural sugar from dates and berries.If your food has 'nature-derived' or 'nature-identical' flavors & colors - It is NOT natural. 100% natural means ingredients you can pronounce.Ingredients that grew on a farm. Not something synthesized in a chemistry lab.Fats aren't bad. Bad fats are bad (duh). And bad fats are almost always man-made hydrogenated fats like palm oil.Thankfully, all the fats in our bars are from nuts and coconuts - all natural, all good.

description: Product Description,Inspired by the illuminate trend, Lakme ’s Perfect Radiance range is now elevated to a new level of luxury and efficacy. The high-resolution clarity of a crystal is now captured in the New Lakme Absolute Perfect Radiance range. If you wish for skin that has a flawless and illuminating glow, then this Lakme Absolute Perfect Radiance Skin Brightening Day Crème is formulated just for you. This Skin Brightening Day crème with precious micro-crystals and skin Brightening vitamins gives you a fair, illuminated look. Moisture rich yet so ultra light this crème melts into your skin with a silky feel. This formulation gently polishes your skin to reveal that illuminated look. This Day Crème replenishes and moisturizes your skin giving it an instant fairer glow. Its advanced skin Brightening formula is infused with vitamins, to give you a radiant, flawless skin. Its smooth, rich texture suits all skin types and is perfect to add to your cosmetic kit. Its sunscreens with SPF 30 protect your skin from sun damage. Along with luminous, glowing skin, the day cream gives you an even skin surface. It prevents dark spots, blemishes and breakouts giving you the perfect, radiant look. Look younger and glow every day with the Lakme Perfect Radiance Fairness Day Creme- buy it now! Step 1: Lightly scoop out the crème on to your palm. Step 2: Dot your forehead, cheeks, nose and chin. Step 3: Gently massage the crème with your fingers in an upward and outward direction in a spiral motion. Step 4: Make sure to cover every area of your face.,From the Manufacturer,Lakme Perfect Radiance Intense Whitening Day Creme addresses the need of having a smooth and radiant skin for men and women. It does this by treating most common skin problems like dark spots, acne, blemishes, excessive tanning, oiliness, and dullness. This cream is ideal for occasional as well as daily use. Consistent use of this cream will rid you of most skin problems, leaving clean, fair, soft, and smooth skin behind.,This cream penetrates into deep skin layers treating your skin at the roots. It controls any excess formation of melanin that causes skin darkness. It also contains skin lightening vitamins to enrich your skin, and regular use will give you fairer skin. It is good for use on oily as well as dry skin, and it provides a moisturizing effect on your skin. The cream also leaves a floral fragrance on your skin. The titanium dioxide listed as one of its ingredients works as a sunscreen as well.,The Lakme Perfect Radiance Intense Whitening Day Creme should not have contact with your eyes, and in case this happens your eyes need to be washed properly with cold water. This cream is only for external use. This product is a great option for an instant whitening effect and long-term fading of any spots on your skin.,Product Features, The cream comes in a 50g container. aplus_text: When you need buttery-soft skin, you need to give it extra care and nourishment. Give it the love of Cocoa Butter that intensely moisturizes and softens your skin.Cocoa Butter is a magical herbal ingredient that:• has antioxidant properties that can repair damaged skin, promote healing and prevent your skin from drying.• is a high-quality emollient and a moisturizing agent. It deeply moisturizes the skin, prevents it from cracking, and makes it supple.• is a rich source of Vitamin E, which helps moisturize and makes dull skin look fresh and healthy.• possesses anti-ageing properties that promote healthy and younger-looking skin.No matter what your skin type is, every skin demands care and protection during winters. An extra dose of love can keep your skin healthy and soft throughout the season.Normal skin requires nourishment. And so, a mild herbal body lotion helps you keep your skin feeling soft, supple and toned.It's best to apply a lotion that has natural ingredients like Aloe Vera and Winter Cherry. They soothe, moisturize and promote healthy skin through skin cell regeneration.While you can apply body lotion when you feel like, it works wonders when applied right after a shower because your skin is most receptive to hydration then.Winter skincare tips:• Pay attention to areas like your elbows and knees which need extra moisturizing.• Keep yourself covered while you step out as the cold air tends to deplete skin moisture.On hot summer days, our skin needs to cool down and rehydrate to retain its softness and shine. The goodness of Aloe Vera and Cucumber in a light moisturizing body lotion is exactly what your skin needs.Cucumber cools and rehydrates your skin, which keeps it from drying. Aloe Vera refreshes your skin with its regenerative properties, to give you soft skin that feels fresh.This body lotion is very light to ensure absorption by your skin even on the hottest and most humid summer days without leaving your skin sticky.Himalaya Soothing Body Lotion is silky, lightweight and non-greasy. It is designed for skin types that feel sticky with moisturizer use.Himalaya Soothing Body Lotion:• has enhanced skin absorption properties.• is enriched with Grape Seed that's rich in Vitamin E and antioxidants, which helps repair skin damage to keep it younger-looking and healthy.• has Almond Oil that deeply moisturises skin and protects it from sun damage.• keeps your skin soft, smooth and healthy.
bullets: Quantity: 400ml; Item Form: Lotion  , Our moisturizer is enriched with the goodness of Cocoa Butter and Wheat Germ Oil, which replenish the lost moisture in dry skin  , Naturally derived ingredients restore skin's elasticity, leaving it softer and more toned than before  , Skin Type: Dry Skin  , Usage: Apply Cocoa Butter Intensive Body Lotion gently all over the body, with special attention to severely dry areas, slowly massaging it in  , Target Audience: Men & Women  , Package Contents: 1 Body Lotion.The Product appearance may differ from the actual image on the website due to packaging changes  , Country of Origin: India
description: Whether its winter, summer or spring, give you skin the care and protection it deserves all round the year with the Himalaya Herbals Intensive Moisturizing Body Lotion. No matter you have a dry, scaly or chafed skin – this herbal body lotion from Himalaya is the one solution for all your skin problems. Regular application may even make the extremely dry skin soft and supple. Enriched with natural ingredients, it is chemical-free, making it a great choice for sensitive skin type./p Dry and damaged skin needs extra protection. The Himalaya body lotion penetrates deeply into the skin to nourish it and instantly moisturises it, leaving the skin looking healthier than ever before. It hydrates the skin and keeps it soft and smooth all through the day./p It contains cocoa butter, a natural moisturiser and deep-nourishing emollient that effectively softens the skin. It heals chafing, giving you silky smooth skin. Cocoa butter also contains antioxidants to repair the damaged, lifeless skin. Olive Oil and vitamin E present in this body lotion keep dryness at bay. Olive oil also has antimicrobial properties to heal skin irritations, rashes and imperfections./p The Himalaya Herbals Intensive Moisturizing Body Lotion also has Grapeseed Oil, a natural astringent that tightens the skin to make it wrinkle-free and helps even the skin tone. The linoleic acid in Grapeseed is one of the essential fatty acids that nourish skin the natural way. Rich in vitamin E, the wheatgerm oil in this moisturising body lotion improves skin elasticity./p Packing all natural goodness in a single bottle, this herbal body lotion provides unbelievable results when used regularly after shower. aplus_text: Papa Pawsome features Shine O’ Fur Massage Oil that helps in bring back the old shine of your pet’s fur, which makes them look more adorable and cute. The USP of this oil is that, it uses only natural ingredients that also help in maintaining its natural health.By massaging with this oil, you may give them a very soothing and relaxing experience.A simple search for paw cream for their dog Aurum, led to Pratik & Nishita building the Papa Pawsome brand, prompted by the lack of availability of an effective and safe paw cream. That's how we started rolling the dice, our objective was very clear and simple i.e. to come up with a paw cream that was mild enough to not harm dogs. After extensive research and trial and error, the first prototype was born – a paw cream made of natural ingredients which showed great results with no side effects.The Indian market lacked a product of rivalling quality and effectiveness and that’s when we started putting the right checks in the right places that’s how the journey of Papa Pawsome began. We added Natural Shampoo, Aroma therapy massage oil, Waterless shampoo, Healing balms, Silicone free detangling serum, Spa gifts. We pledge to provide only the best for your pet and for you. Our goal is to be the most trusted brand for pet products in the world.
bullets: WHY DO YOU NEED A DOG MASSAGE OIL - The changing climate affects your dog's skin and coat just as it affects your skin. This could cause dryness, infections, shedding, and other issues, as well as make your dog stressful. Using the same oils we use for our skin may not be as effective as your dog's skin, fur, pH and effect to allergens are all different. This is where a massage oil like Papa Pawsome's Shine O Fur Massage Oil for dogs comes to the rescue!  , ALL-NATURAL SHINE O FUR MASSAGE OIL FOR DOGS - Papa Pawsome's Shine O Fur Dog Massage Oil is especially formulated to nourish and moisturize your dog's coat/fur and improve its thickness and shine. With a blend of 100% natural ingredients, it's also great for aromatherapy. Let your dog take in the soothing aroma and relax!  , FOR SHINY FUR & REDUCED SHEDDING - With the goodness of Rosemary Oil, Cedarwood Oil, Almond Oil, and Jojoba Oil, this massage oil is a completely safe and effective remedy against skin issues. It deeply nourishes, moisturizes and keeps your dog's fur healthy, thick, and shiny!  , MOISTURIZES & RELAXES WITH AROMATHERAPY - While you can use this massage oil for dogs to keep their coat/fur healthy; you can also use it for a relaxing, aromatherapy massage and to help relieve stress, calm your dog and improve their blood circulation.  , SKIN-FRIENDLY & EFFECTIVE - With a unique all-natural formula and zero harmful chemicals or toxins, Papa Pawsome Shine O Fur Massage Oil for dogs is completely safe to nourish your dog's senstive skin.
title: Papa Pawsome Shine O Fur Massage Oil for Dogs with Natural Ingredients | Nourishes & Improves Coat/Fur Shine | Reduces Shedding | Relaxes & Relieves Stress with Aromatherapy, Moisturizes | 100ml

aplus_text: Go DESi Lemon Chaat is tiny bits of dried lemon mixed with Indian spices to give it the perfect chatpata taste.GO DESi sources the lemon chat from a 1st generation rural entrepreneur based in Tattikai village in Malnad. Eat it like a chooran or carry it along on your travels. You can even munch on it in between meals.- Lemon naturally dried under the sun and then mixed with salt, pepper and a hint of chilli.- If you ever wanted to carry a pickle in your pocket, this is it!- Handmade in rural kitchens: Made by self-help groups, women entrepreneurs in rural areas. For every Lemon Chaat you buy, 30% goes back to the micro-unit.- Authentic traditional recipe.- All Natural - No added flavour, colour or sugar.- Comes in handy and easy to carry a pack of 8 pouches.With great travelling stories, comes the responsibility of dealing with motion sickness and in the case of motion sickness, we can say, a Lemon Chaat a day keeps the doctor away!GO DESi sources the lemon chat from a 1st generation rural entrepreneur based in Tattikai village in Malnad.Made with love by self-help groups, women entrepreneurs in rural areas. For every Lemon Chaat you buy, 30% goes back to the micro-unit.Lemon naturally dried and then mixed with salt, pepper and a hint of chilli.GO DESi is our attempt to bring back stories from all the nook and corners of India. Some people might sing, read, or write to share their, and we believe that we can speak through food, through our healthy and hearty snacks.Each product is handmade in small batches using local ingredients and recipes which have stood the test of time. Each product is unique like all the different regions of India, and like India, the beauty of GO DESi lies in the diversity of flavours.

aplus_text: Zevic is one of India’s first companies to produce zero calorie Stevia based sweeteners and Stevia sweetened products. Launched in 2015, Zevic provides only the best quality sugar free products that serve as the perfect guilt free indulgences. All processes are US FDA compliant and each product is non GMO certified. Zevic was created with the aim to combat the ill-effects of artificial sweeteners without compromising on taste. Today,Zevic manufactures Stevia extracts, Steviol Glycoside Powder, Liquid Stevia and Stevia based chocolate.Stevia Rebaudiana, more commonly referred to as Stevia is a naturally occurring plant based sweetener and sugar substitute. The active compounds present in Stevia contain nearly 200 times the sweetness of sugar and are heat and pH stable as well as not fermentable. Stevia based sweeteners have zero or minimal calories. Stevia is also packed with vitamins A, B and C as well as minerals such as zinc and calcium. Being zero caloric, Stevia proves to be one of the healthiest alternatives for sugar in every way, it can be used to cook, bake or just as is.Erythritol is a zero calorie natural sweetener with no known side effects. Unlike other   sugar substitutes, Erythritol is derived from fruits and it has almost no calories. Apart from being found in fruits, it is also found naturally in foods that ferment such as wine and cheese. Erythritol is 0.6 times sweeter   han sugar in the same concentration. It is heat stable and is therefore ideal for looking and baking. Erythritol is known to have the lowest caloric content amongst all other sugar alcohols and is approved by U.S FDAAs it is zero caloric, Erythritol aides in weight loss and weight control. Erythritol does not spike insulin, this makes it the perfect solution for diabetics, health conscious individuals, individuals who are trying to lose weight and individuals with health concerns. All of Zevic’s products are also keto friendly.Zevic’s Stevia powder is a zero calorie, natural sweetener that can substitute for sugar and artificial sweeteners. Made from the extracts of Stevia and Erythritol, Zevic’s sugar free stevia powder is also gluten free, GMO free and serves as an all purpose sweetener. It is heat stable and therefore can be used not only in beverages but also for other cooking and baking purposes. Free of sucralose, aspartame, dextrose, maltodextrin and lactose, it is the perfect solution for diabetics, health conscious individuals, individuals who are trying to lose weight and individuals with health concerns. All of Zevic’s products are also keto friendly.HealthyPureKeto

aplus_text: As India’s first 100% nature-derived wellness brand, we create plant-based, vegan products with soothing, toxin-free ingredients that feel fantastic on your hair and skin.Our products are thoughtfully created using only all-natural ingredients with no chemical additives, emulsifiers, dyes or preservatives. The formula treats surface level damage inflicted by environmental aggressors, harsh detangling, brushing and styling.Infused with Abyssinian seed oil, argan oil, olive oil, almond oil and shea butter, this mask  is chock-full of conditioning and moisturizing agents. aplus_text: So, you've tried everything–hair masks, deep conditioners, clarifying shampoos­. So far, nothing has worked to reduce hair fall and rid your scalp of flakes. But what you might not realize is that it could be the products you're using directly contributing to the damage.Harsh ingredients can dry out your skin and strip your hair follicles of their natural protective oils. If you can bring back nourishment and moisture, you can even nurture growth!Stress, styling, and harsh hair products can contribute to hair damage, thinning, and hair fall. Our nourishing shampoo-conditioner may help by resupplying your hair with the nutrients it needs to rebuild its structure.This product is rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants from Amla. Methi supplies fiber, iron, and protein. Bhringraj may also help by promoting scalp circulation, strengthening your roots, and promoting hair growth.It’s easy to be swayed by synthetic fragrances and products that promise completely fresh, new-looking hair overnight. But if you want real results that last, it’s time to fix your hair care routine from the roots.This shampoo-and-conditioner-in-one is infused with neem, geranium, and lavender oil, plus extracts from aloe vera, Brahmi, bhringraj, amla, methika, and licorice. Harness the power of nature for your hair!Excess oil doesn’t mean your scalp isn’t dry. Oil production is a sign your scalp needs major hydration.To help with dandruff control, our shampoo has methi (Fenugreek) extract which contains lecithin, a natural emollient that may help condition and moisturize your hair and scalp. It also has geranium oil that may help soothe an itchy scalp and protective nutrients from neem oil to keep irritants at bayConditioner is supposed to smooth down your hair cuticles after shampooing to restore softness and shine to the strands. That means it’s not working if your hair stays limp and flat or dry, brittle, and frizzy after every wash.You don't need to reach for a separate bottle of heavier conditioner–instead, this 2-in-1 product is loaded with natural oils and plant extracts that will help keep your hair as smooth as silk!Not all shampoos were made for regular use by all hair types. But if you need a product you can use for daily hair care, this natural cleanser boasts a mild formulation that won’t dry out the skin or your strands.Men, women, and kids can safely use it as a daily hair wash without worrying about stripping off oils or protective layers–helping hair stay fresh, clean, vibrant, and soft to the touch.
bullets: Refresh Your Hair & Scalp - Ditch harsh hair products. Deep-clean your scalp, restore hydration, and strengthen your hair from root to tip with a rejuvenating natural 2-in-1 shampoo and conditioner.  , Supports Hair Growth - Infused with nourishing plant extracts including amla, bhringraj, brahmi, liquorice, and methika, our moisturizing shampoo and conditioner helps replenish nutrients and promote growth.  , Oil & Dandruff Control - Excess oil and buildup can lead to an itchy, flaky scalp. Amla extract and Geranium oil may help clear the clog and rebalance your scalp to soothe the skin and banish flakes.  , For Long, Strong, Silky Hair - It also has hydrating Aloe vera to restore moisture deep into the strands. This helps protect your follicles from breakage or hair fall and adds smoothness and shine.  , Gentle Formulation - This ayurvedic herbal shampoo has a fresh fragrance and is gentle enough for daily use. Just knead the flour with hot water and indulge in your favourite rotis.Aashirvaad's Nature's Superfoods Gluten Free Flour is the perfect solution for people who love to eat wheat rotis but are sensitive to gluten. Just knead the flour with hot water and indulge in your favourite rotis.Aashirvaad's Nature's Superfoods Gluten Free Flour is the perfect solution for people who love to eat wheat rotis but are sensitive to gluten. Just knead the flour with hot water and indulge in your favourite rotis.Aashirvaad's Nature's Superfoods Gluten Free Flour is the perfect solution for people who love to eat wheat rotis but are sensitive to gluten. Just knead the flour with hot water and indulge in your favourite rotis.Preparation Time: 25 minsCooking Time: 15 minsBaking Time: 35-40 minsBaking Temperature: 180°C (360°F)Makes: 10Ingredients1/2 Cup Aashirvaad Gluten Free Flour1/2 Cup Deseeded And Chopped Dates (Khajur)3 Tbsp Chopped Cashew Nuts (Kaju)1/2 Cup Soya Flour1/2 Cup Butter4 Tbsp Powdered Sugar1 1/2 Tbsp Cocoa Powder1/2 Tsp Butter For GreasingMethod1. Combine the dates and ¾ cup of water in a deep pan and cook for 15 minutes till the dates are fully mashed.2. Combine the soya flour, Aashirvaad Gluten Free Flour, butter, and sugar in a bowl using your fingertips till the mixture resembles bread crumbs.3. Add the date mixture, cashew nuts and cocoa powder, mix well and knead it into a semi-stiff dough.4. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes.5. Divide the dough into 10 equal portions and roll each portion into a small round.6. Grease the baking tray lightly with butter and bake in a pre-heated oven at 180°c (360°f) for 30 to 35 minutes.7. Cool and store in an airtight container.Preparation Time: 10 minsCooking Time: 30 minsMakes: 8Ingredients:1 Cup Aashirvaad Gluten Free Flour½ Cup Besan1 Tsp Cumin Seeds Crushed2 Onions Finely Chopped2 Tomatoes Finely Chopped4 Green Chillies Finely Chopped½ Cup Coriander Chopped1 Tsp Aashirvaad Turmeric Powder1 Tsp Aashirvaad Red Chilli PowderOil For GreasingAashirvaad Salt To TasteAashirvaad Gluten Free Flour For RollingMethod:1. Combine all the ingredients and make a loose dough using enough water.2. Divide into 8 equal portions. Place one portion on a greased tava and pat it with your fingers to form a 5” circle. If it stick to your fingers, dip your fingers in water and pat again.3. Cook on both sides on a non-stick pan using oil till brown spots appear.4. Serve with chutney of your choice.Prep Time: 30 minsServes: 10Ingredients1 Cup Aashirvaad Gluten Free Flour½ Cup Besan1 Tbsp Green Chilli Paste1 Tsp Aashirvaad Chilli Powder1 Tbsp Sesame Seeds2 Tbsp Crushed Or Coarsely Grounded Peanut Powder1 Tbsp Hot Oil½ Tsp Cooking Soda1 Cup Coriander Leaves Finely Chopped1 Inch Ginger Grated½ Tsp Aashirvaad Turmeric PowderOil As RequiredAashirvaad Salt To TasteMethod1. Keep steamer and high flame for steaming2. Take a mixing bowl, add Aashirvaad Gluten Free Flour, besan, Aashirvaad Chilli Powder, Aashirvaad Turmeric Powder, green chilli paste, Aashirvaad Salt, sesame seeds, peanut powder, cooking soda, ginger, hot oil and mix well3. Add chopped coriander leaves add enough water and make a batter.4. Transfer the batter into greased plate or mould.5. Place in steamer for 15 mins. After 15 mins turn off flame.6. Let it cool. Cut into the desired shape.7. Take a pan, add some oil and shallow fry the kothimbir vadi till golden colour. It's ready to serve.8. Serve with chutney.
bullets: Aashirvaad Nature’s Superfoods Gluten Free Flour is made from ancient grains such as Jowar and Ragi which have a good nutritional profile  , This naturally gluten free flour is rich in dietary fibre and is a source of protein  , It is also a source of Iron that aids in formation of Haemoglobin and a source of Magnesium which helps reduce fatigue  , People with gluten intolerance can now indulge in their favourite rotis without any fear!  , One hot tip for making tasty rotis – Knead it with hot water
description: Aashirvaad ensures that only superior quality products reach your kitchen and Aashirvaad Nature’s Superfoods Gluten Free Flour stays true to that word. Expertly sourced, carefully processed and hygienically packed, this naturally gluten free flour ensures that you get the best of nutrition and taste. Aashirvaad Gluten Free Flour is not only tasty but is also loaded with nutritional benefits. It is rich in dietary fibre and is a source of protein. The flour is a source of Magnesium which helps you power through the day by reducing fatigue. It is also a source of Iron which helps in formation of Haemoglobin. Rich in flavour and nutrition, Aashirvaad Nature’s Superfoods ensures the best of both worlds

aplus_text: Hair to Stay is an anti-hair fall oil that gives your scalp the essential nutrients required to strengthen your hair from its roots to prevent breakage.Uncap the oil pod bottle and apply the entire oil blend at one time using the given dropper. Release the oil closer to your scalp at the targeted area, while also applying it to the hair ends. Massage for 2-5 minutes using your fingertips from the root to tip. Gentle stretching can help relieve neck stiffness, provide neck support, help reduce the pressure on the cervical spine, and effectively help relieve chronic neck pain.  , 【 Elastic Stretch 】 Made of high-density elastic self-skinning foam, which is firm and strong, providing a firm, lightweight base. description: Usage: 1. Put this cervical traction device on a flat place, lay on it. 2. Adjust the position and find the comfortable place. Suspend your head and stretch neck by natural gravity.

description: Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo is a mild, "no tears" shampoo that gently cleanses hair making it soft, shiny, and easy to manage. It softens, nourishes and improves your baby's hair lustre, leaving it soft and fresh. This gentle baby shampoo is formulated to cleanse and strengthen your little one's hair without any teary-eyed blues. It is so gentle that your tot is definitely going to love it. Himalaya shampoo is in essence a natural shampoo containing no harsh chemicals. It boasts anti-inflammatory and soothing properties to protect and care for your baby's tender scalp. All in all, it is an essential baby care product that helps you get rid of dirt and other harmful infectious particles from your child's scalp, without damaging it. The mild and soft Himalaya herbal shampoo moisturises and nourishes your baby's hair improving its texture. Its core ingredients include chickpea, hibiscus and khus khus. The protein-rich chickpea leaves the hair strong and shiny, while hibiscus acts as a natural conditioner to make it soft and smooth. Khus-khus soothes the baby's scalp, with its antibacterial and antifungal properties. These natural ingredients make Himalaya baby care shampoo perfectly safe for daily use. It cleanses, disinfects and leaves behind a mild scent and lustre with its ideal pH balance. Easy to use, just apply this Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo, lather and rinse well to get those shiny baby locks instantly.

aplus_text: If you love wearing heavy make-up but have trouble with getting it all off at the end of the day, try Garnier’s Micellar Cleansing Bi-Phase Water! The formula is enriched with Micelles – these are cleansing agents that absorb make-up, impurities and dirt like a magnet & lift them away from skin without any need for rubbing or pulling on the skin. This specific type of Micellar Cleansing Water is also enriched with argan oil, which also help with lift heavy make-up off and at the same time nourishes the skin. With a swipe, your skin feels fresher and is cleansed from stubborn make-up, dirt & impurities.Garnier’s Micellar Water is enriched with cleansing molecules called Micelles that attract make-up and other impurities, lifting them away from your pores just like a magnet in a single swipe without irritating sensitive skin.Take a cotton pad and pour some micellar water onto the pad until it is soaked. We recommend using the Garnier Micellar Reusable Eco Pad to help remove the make-up gently and sustainably.Press the cotton pad on the area that you want to cleanse.Gently swipe across your face to take off all impurities from your skin.You don’t need to rinse your face if you’ve completely cleansed your face with the micellar water.
bullets: Make-up remover and cleanser for heavy & water-proof make-up  , The formula gently removes makeup, cleanses your skin and makes it feel softer and nourished  , How to use: Pour out a bit of the water on a cotton pad and wipe gently across the face, lips and eyes - no rubbing or pulling needed!  , Enriched with argan oil and cleansing molecules called Micelles that attract make-up and other impurities, lifting them away from your pores - just like a magnet  , Contents: 1x Garnier Skin Naturals Micellar Oil-Infused Cleansing Water, Volume: 125 ml
description: Garnier Micellar Oil-Infused Cleansing Water is a make-up remover that removes make-up and other impurities from your skin easily. It is enriched with cleansing molecules called Micelles that attract make-up and other impurities, lifting them away from your pores – just like a magnet. No rubbing is needed. How to use – Shake the bottle, pour it onto cotton, press lightly on the skin for a few seconds, and wipe away gently. The proof is on the cotton. Garnier Micellar Oil-Infused Cleansing Water is perfect for heavy and waterproof make-up. If lighter make-up is more your style, you can try Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water.

aplus_text: Our toothpaste treats your smile with the gentle care it deserves. The Magic Mint flavour in this formula is proprietary. aplus_text: What’s Up Sleep Gummies deliver a unique blend of active ingredients that work together to promote restful sleep so you wake up with relaxed muscles. Our Sleep 5mg Melatonin gummies, with L-Theanine and Chamomile, Tart Cherry, and Vitamin D2 work to help you fall asleep and reduce muscle soreness.Doze off into tranquil sleep with a calming sensation and wake up feeling refreshed and ready to take on the world with our Sleep Gummies. Formulated consciously with 5 powerful extracts that help you relax, get uninterrupted sleep and reduce muscle tension and soreness.Chamomile provides a soothing sensation while L-Theanine and 5mg Melatonin work together to help you doze off to a peaceful uninterrupted slumber. The benefit-driven duo of Tart Cherry and Vitamin D2 act on your tired muscles and joints, helping to restore them so that you wake up refreshed.What is the flavor of the Sleep Gummies?The Sleep gummies are flavoured with natural mango extracts. A deliciously fruity taste.How do I take the Sleep gummies?Your 1 sleep gummy should be taken 30 to 45 minutes before bedtime. Be careful not to drive after taking your gummies as they work quickly.When will I see the effects of my Sleep treatment?The Sleep treatment is effective from the first dose, you fall asleep faster and the quality of your sleep is improved. After three weeks, your sleep cycles are regulated and you wake up less at night.At what age can you start enjoying the Sleep gummies?Our gummies have been specially designed for adults. This means that the Sleep gummies can be enjoyed from the age of 18.Is there a risk of dependency or addiction to Sleep gummies?Unlike sleeping pills, our Sleep Gummies are not addictive. They do not cause physical or psychological dependence with withdrawal or rebound syndrome after you stop using them.We are not just focused on you falling asleep peacefully but our scientifically proven ingredients ensure that you wake up feeling fit and active!Our Sleep Gummies are a perfect blend of nutrients in their optimal quantities and are 100% safe to consume by adults and are not addictive in nature.Chew one gummy 30 minutes before going to sleep. Do not take while driving, operating machinery, or engaging in any activity that requires alertness.Our blend features 5 mg of Melatonin, this sleepy-time superstar ingredient that works with your body to help you fall asleep and stay asleep. L-Theanine supports calmness and Chamomile helps you relax. The powerful duo of Tart Cherry and Vitamin D2 reduces muscular stiffness and soreness.We are proud to associate with GiveIndia in their 'Every Girl In School' initiative. With every pack of What's Up Sleep Gummies for Muscle Recovery sold, we contribute a part of the revenue and ensure we give back to society.

aplus_text: From the brand that you love and trust, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee comes to you after going through a 4-stage stringent quality process.Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee is made with Pure Cow Milk, that gives it a natural golden colour.This desi ghee is prepared is by slowly cooking for about 3.5 hours over gradually increased temperatures.The SloCook process gives the ghee its delicious aroma and granular texture which will reminds you of mom's food.Aashirvaad Svasti is Pure Cow Ghee that naturally contains Vitamin A which is known to support immunity.Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee lends itself beautifully to varied Indian dishes.Serves: 4 Cooking time: 60 minIngredients:Carrot - 1kg, Sugar - 500gm, Khova - 500gm, Milk - 1litre, Cashew - 40gm, Raisin - 30gm, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee – 4 tbspPreparation:1. Peel the carrots & grate them. In a pan fry cashews & raisins in 4 tbsp of Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee.2. Now add the grated carrot and sauté for 20 minutes, till the moisture of the carrot dries out.3. Add milk, khova and sugar, cook on medium heat for 30 minutes while stirring continuously till the mixture dries up.4. Gajar ka halwa is now ready to serve.Serves: 4 Cooking time: 45 minIngredients:Pineapple cubes ( small ) - 300gms, Semolina/Rawa - 1 cup, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee - 4 tbsp, Saffron - half a gram, Sugar - 1 cup, Cashew - 6, Raisins - 6, Water - 1½ cupsPreparation:1. Heat 2 tbsp of Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee in a pan and fry the raisins and cashews. Keep aside.2. In a bowl heat water, add the chopped pineapple cubes and saffron. Allow it to cook till it becomes slightly soft.3. Meanwhile, heat 2 tbsp of Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee in a pan and dry roast the rawa till it turns golden brown.4. Now add the water and pineapple mixture to the rawa and keep stirring to ensure no lumps are formed.5. Add sugar and saffron and continue to stir till all the moisture evaporates and the semolina is cooked completely.6. Garnish with raisins & cashews and serve hot.Serves: 4 Cooking time: 45 minIngredients:Rice flour - 2 cups, Gram flour - 1 cup, Pepper powder - ½ tsp, Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee - 3 tbsp, Asafoetida - ¼ tsp, Salt - 1/2 tsp, Sesame seeds: 1 tsp, Water as needed to make dough Oil For deep fryingPreparation:1. In a bowl, mix rice flour, gram flour, pepper powder, sesame seeds, salt, asafoetida and Aashirvaad Svasti Ghee.2. Add water as required to make a stiff non sticky dough.3. Take a ribbon murukku mould and keep a ball of dough in the press.4. Use the press directly over hot oil and fry till golden.5. Enjoy ribbon murukku with a hot cup of tea/coffee.
bullets: Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee is a premium ghee made with a special SloCook process  , This desi ghee is prepared by slow cooking it for about 3.5 hours over gradually increased temperatures  , The SloCook process gives the ghee its rich aroma, golden granular texture and consistent quality  , This rich and aromatic Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee naturally contains Vitamin A that is known to support immunity  , Now enhance the aroma and deliciousness of every dish with Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee, which is made with love, in India
description: Aashirvaad, the brand that you trust and love, always ensures that only the best quality products reach your kitchen and Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee stays true to that. Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee has been made with love in India, going through a 4-stage stringent quality process.,Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee is made with a special SloCook process, similar to the process of making ghee at home. In this process, the ghee is prepared by cooking slowly for about three and a half hours over gradually increased temperatures, which enhances its natural aroma. Enjoy this desi ghee which has a rich aroma, golden granular texture, and consistent quality. Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee not only complements your cooking but also adds a tempting aroma to your dishes. This desi cow ghee naturally contains Vitamin A which is known to support immunity. So, add a spoonful of deliciousness to your meal with Aashirvaad Svasti Pure Cow Ghee.

bullets: New Ring Noodles- exciting shape for a fun snack time  , Lip-smacking masala makes it yummy to eat  , All Yum, No Maida – hence healthy for you  , Goodness of whole grain oats and real vegetables  , Rich in Fibre and High in Protein  , Make Oodles Instantly. Ready in 5 mins
description: Introducing SAFFOLA OODLES - The Ring Noodles! Now, make your snack time truly yummmazingg with all new Saffola Oodles. Its unique ring shape makes it fun to eat and its lip-smacking masala flavour leaves you craving more. And what’s more, its healthy too- All Yummm, No Maida- so you can snack on guilt free. Saffola Oodles brings in the goodness of whole grain oats and real vegetables- thus makes it a mouth-watering snack filled with goodness- any time of the day!! It comes with a Yummy Masala mix sachet inside which you can add as per your taste. Saffola Oodles is super easy to prepare- get your hot bowl instantly in 5 minutes in just 1,2,3,4- 1. Simmer- Take 260ml (1 & 3/4 teacup) water and bring to boil. 2. Snip- Cut the pack, add rings and cook for 5 mins, stirring occasionally. 3. Sprinkle- Add your yummy masala sachet mix to the soupy mix and serve hot. 4. Serve- Garnish with your favourite toppings and enjoy! We recommend making it slightly soupy for the best taste. You can get creative and add your own magic to it too- add your favourite garnishing – chopped coriander, grated cheese or more veggies for your own unique bowl of Saffola Oodles. You can have it with a spoon or a fork - it's your choice. So, go ahead, have a delicious bowl of Saffola Oodles- your snack times will now be Oodles of Yummm and Oodles of Fun!

aplus_text: AS-IT-IS Peanut Butter, a paste made from dry, roasted peanuts is a perfectly tasty and healthy combination. If you can think of a small amount of food that can give you a whole lot of nutrition, it would be none other than Peanut butter. Peanut butter is a  highly digestible, healthy, tasty treat packed with powerful nutrients and healthy fats.is a rare element in the modern day world. Often, what you get in the market is heavily contaminated due to several reasons. When you consume ingredients that are contaminated or mixed with unnatural additives, it has an adverse effect on your overall health and well-being. Several studies have also found harmful effects of toxins on the normal functioning of the bodyProtein is vital for building and maintaining muscles. Peanut butter is one of the best and least expensive sources of protein you can find. Peanut butter contains a good amount of protein. A serving (2 tablespoons) of Peanut butter packs in 8-9g of protein.Adequate fiber is very important for the healthy functioning of our body. A serving (2 tablespoons) of Peanut butter gives you 3g of dietary fiber. The fiber adds bulk to our diets helping us feel full. Fiber will slow the absorption of certain foods so that blood sugar is better controlled.Moreover, having a good amount of fiber suggests it’ll digest slower than simple carbohydrates. The fiber content helps maintain good digestive health and pulls out excess toxins from the body, control appetite and keeps you feeling full.If you are trying to find a quick energy booster that’s free from caffeine and other stimulants, you must try Peanut butter. The fats found in Peanut butter, along with fiber and proteins stabilize insulin levels and ensure constant energy supply for hours. Peanut butter like all other protein sources has slow digesting properties that is an added advantage because the slow digesting property helps the calorie-dense Peanut butter to give you a stable energy burst that lasts much longer. Besides, Peanut butter is a good source of carbohydrates. The carbs turn into glycogen, which provides energy to your muscles.Peanut butter will not only keep you fuller, but it’ll keep you fueled.Peanut butter is, an amino acid which is one of the building blocks of protein. Arginine is a precursor to nitric oxide, a compound that expands your blood vessels.Peanut butter is a healthful option when used as a part of your balanced diet. It has fantastic nutty flavor, is easily spreadable and has thick texture. Makes it a delicious treat when used as a spread on sandwiches.Two tablespoon of peanut Butter can give you a whole lot of nutrition & a quick source of energy. Try keeping Peanut butter in your gym bag for a convenient and tasty source of essential nutrients to power your workout routine.Peanut butter makes it a great way to add creaminess and taste to your favourite protein shakes.  Try blending banana, apple,peanut butter and ice for a refreshing breakfast replacement.The rich and thick consistency of Peanut butter makes it ideal for addition in protein bar. Combine peanut butter with a high-fiber, low-sugar cereal and form into bar for an easy, filling and tasty snack.

bullets: RESTORES SMOOTHNESS: The Ultra Smoothing Hair Shampoo + Hair Mask Kit reduces damage, locks in moisture, repairs damaged hair and restores smoothness.  , WHAT CAUSES COARSE AND DAMAGED HAIR? : Dry hair is caused due to lack of natural oil & moisture that act as lubricants all along the hair fiber. This shampoo moisturizes hair and restores smoothness.  , CARBOHYDRATE COMPLEX: It is the main source of nutrition for dry hair. Carbohydrate Complex prevents hair breakage and promotes hair growth.  , NIACINAMIDE: It is a form of Vitamin B3 beneficial for hair health. It improves efficiency of keratin synthesis and regulates scalp and hair oil production.  , LOCKS IN MOISTURE: Niacinamide helps in retaining moisture, maintaining moisture balance of scalp.  , CLEAN BEAUTY: You and your hair matter to us. This kit is formulated without any harmful chemicals, it’s Derma Tested and Sulfate free and paraben free.  , BASED ON 10 MILLION REAL CONSUMER INSIGHTS: The Bare Anatomy Ultra Smoothing Hair Shampoo and Hair Mask Kit has been formulated after 3 years of extensive research, and creating over 1 Million Unique Formulations with over 10 Million real consumer insights to provide the best product to tackle hair problems.
description: The Bare Anatomy Expert Ultra Smoothing Shampoo and Hair Mask Kit has been formulated after extensive scientific and technological research backed by QT Charge Technology in order to curb any damage and restore smoothness of your hair. Hair naturally withers over time but the damage is accelerated due to a loss of the natural oils like sebum, essential nutrients and moisture from the hair caused by certain external factors and conditions and own activities to damage the hair further. External Factors like UV rays, salt and chloride in water and own activities like chemical treatments, excessive use of heat and appliances on the hair and washing the hair with hot water are a few reasons for hair to get damaged further. Over time, when these factors are ignored, it results in loss of natural oil and moisture that act as lubricants all along the hair fiber. Ultra Smoothing Kit consists of high-grade ingredients that have been scientifically proven to provide the hair with the required natural oils, the essential nutrients and to bind moisture into the hair and hair follicle. The first key ingredient in the Ultra Smoothing Shampoo and Hair Mask Kit is Carbohydrate Complex. Carbohydrate Complex acts as a main source of energy and nutrition for dry, frizzy and coarse hair strands. It protects keratin fibers from heat damage during hair treatments. They provide energy to convert protein into the cells that form hair.Hence, preventing hair breakage, promoting hair growth, repairing and growing hair cells, and maintaining hair cell energy. The second key ingredient in the Ultra Smoothing Kit is Niacinamide. Niacinamide is a water-soluble form of Vitamin B3 beneficial for both internal and external hair health. It improves efficiency of keratin synthesis and regulates scalp and hair oil production. Additionally it improves the condition of scalp and hair follicles and moisture balance of scalp. Bare Anatomy Ultra Smoothing Kit will leave you with more smoothened and moistu
important_info: Store below 30 degree Celsius, in a cool & dry place away from sunlight. Do not freeze. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Step 1 - Rinse your hair and take the required amount of shampoo. Apply the shampoo on your scalp and along the length of your hair and massage with your fingers. Step 2 - Post Shampoo take the appropriate amount of mask and apply on the length of your wet hair. Let it stay for 5 minutes and then wash it off thoroughly. Step 3 - Take 5-6 pumps of serum on freshly washed clean damp hair, flip hair over and start with the ends concentrating more on them, then work towards the middle sections.

description: Indulekha Bringha Hair Strengthening Mask is an Ayurvedic Proprietary Product. This hair mask is made with 6 precious herbs that nourish and strengthen hair, which helps in reducing hair fall. Indulekha bringha hair mask gives non greasy feel post wash. This hair mask is free from mineral oil, synthetic colours and synthetic fragrances. Indulekha hair mask is suitable for all hair types. It contains ingredients like Bringharaj – known to reduce hairfall and dandruff ; Neem – known for its antimicrobial properties ; Henna – known for its conditioning and natural colouring properties ; Amla – known for its antioxidant properties and is also a natural ayurvedic remedy. Indulekha bringha hair strengthening mask also contains essential oils like Rosemary oil – known to promote thicker hair ; Basil oil, Orange oil and Cedarwood oil. The extracts of these herbs and essential oil are known to nourish and strengthen hair which helps in reducing hair fall. How to use : Take a coin sized amount of Indulekha bringha hair strengthening mask in your palm. Apply on clean, damp hair from root to tips, avoiding the scalp. Leave it for on for 3 minutes. Rinse thoroughly. For best results use twice a week with Indulekha bringha hair shampoo. This mask also goes well with Indulekha Bringha Hair Serum

bullets: 3x STRENGTHENING & DAMAGE REVERSAL: Powered by Cera3X Technology, the Damage Repair Hair Mask strengthens the hair cuticle up to 3 times and reverses hair damage resulting in healthy, smooth, and shiny hair.  , WHAT CAUSES HAIR DAMAGE: Damage is caused by loss of natural oils, moisture and nutrients from the hair, due to external environmental factors and own activities. aplus_text: The Moms Co. Natural Body Wash is India’s only All-Natural, Australia-Certified Toxin-Free coconut body wash. Suitable for anyone looking for a toxin-free body wash for dry skin; it is a combination of gentle coconut based cleansers which help skin restore its natural moisture. Provides enhanced moisturizing with naturally occurring Pro Vitamin B5 that increases your skin's natural elasticity, providing comfort to your stretching belly, hips and breasts. A body wash natural from our range of ideal pregnancy gifts for mom, you can use it to protect your skin the natural way with the best of mamaearth in our range of luxurious pregnancy skin care products. This gentle body wash is a wonderful sls free body wash for regular cleansing in the mornings, evenings, or anytime. ☘  What's In: ❤ Gentle cleansing with coconut-based cleansers ❤ Helps ease Morning Sickness with Ginger essential oil ❤ Provides enhanced moisturizing with naturally occurring Pro Vitamin B5 ❤ Helps skin restore its natural moisture ❤ Lifts your mood with refreshing orange essential oil. ⛔  What's Out: ✖ Our best moisturizing body wash is made without Mineral Oil, Sulphates (SLS, SLES), Parabens, DEA/TEA, Phenoxyethanol, Synthetic Fragrances, PEGs and many other potentially harmful chemicals. ✓ Safe For : Pregnancy, Postpartum, Breastfeeding, Baby ✓ Certified Toxin Free by Safe Cosmetics Australia ✓ Dermatologically tested for sensitive Indian skin.Born out of a mom's need to give only the best to her babies, we, at The Moms Co., are on a mission to help moms make safe, natural, effective choices for themselves and their families.  Our products, developed and tested with the best experts across India, Australia and Switzerland, are made with love and without compromise. With Mother Nature making her presence felt very strongly, everything we create retains the good and rejects the bad to give you a product that is as pure as Mother’s Love.  #LoveWithoutCompromise #MadeWithLove #MadeWithoutCompromiseAt The Moms Co., we use only the most effective natural ingredients for our products. We have zero tolerance for any potentially harmful chemicals and go to great lengths to create products that are safe. All our products are clinically tested and Australian Certified Toxin-Free.Certified Toxic-Free and Made Safe by Safe Cosmetics Australia, a leading NGO that has pioneered the nontoxic certification screening process, verifying product ingredients used by accredited brands are in fact safe & nontoxic since 2010.  Clinically tested by expert dermatologists and Australia Allergy Certified to ensure that the products are non irritant and safe for use on sensitive Indian skin.All our products are made without harmful chemicals like Parabens, Mineral Oil, Sulpathes and even lesser known for Behavioral toxins, Carcinogens, Developmental toxins, Endocrine disruptors, Heavy metals, Neurotoxins, Reproductive toxins or Nanoparticles such as DEA/TEA, Phenoxyethanol, PEGs and more.We source the best natural ingredients available around the world, that not only have great benefit for moms and babies, but are also completely safe and Certified Toxin-Free by multiple agencies globally. Across our products, you will find Natural ingredients like ☘  Cocoa and Shea Butters for deep moisturising ☘  Omega-3, 6, 7, 9, and Vitamins A and E-rich Seabuckthorn Oil that promotes skin elasticity and skin regeneration ☘ To support skin and Collagen Formation, we use Vitamin-C rich Rosehip Oil - a natural skin emollient that penetrates the skin's first few layers almost instantly to help soften dry, rough patches ☘ Natural Vitamin E to help prevent skin damage ☘  Naturally-occurring Pro Vitamin B5 that increases hydration and improves its softness and elasticity ☘  Sweet Almond, Jojoba, Wheatgerm and Extra Virgin Olive Oils that soothe itchy, stretching skin ☘  Peppermint, Ginger and Orange Essential Oils that cool your feet, ease morning sickness and refresh you naturally!1. Careful selection of natural ingredients by expert formulators to ensure that our ingredients meet various international standard across Europe, USA, Canada, Japan and Australia.  2. Extensive validation of short-listed ingredients against international toxicity databases - Environmental Working Group (EWG), Paula's Choice, Whole Foods Premium Skincare, Safe Cosmetics USA and Safe Cosmetics Australia.  3. Extensive stability tests to ensure our products are stable / effective across all weather conditions till they expire.  4. Extensive safety tests by international labs to ensure the products are free from all microbes.  5. Clinical testing by expert dermatologists to ensure that the products are non irritant and safe for use on sensitive Indian skin.  6. Certification of product formulations by FDA and Safe Cosmetics Australia.All Natural, Certified Safe and Toxin-Free, EffectiveThe Moms Co. for us has been a journey 3 years in the making. During our first pregnancy in London, we got introduced to safe, natural, toxin tree products for ourselves and our first daughter, Myraah. When we were expecting Syna, our second daughter, we struggled to find similar products in India that we could trust. We ended up depending on trips abroad or visiting relatives from ‘foreign’ countries to stock up on products that were safe. It was neither feasible nor practical. After 2 years of the struggle and seeing many moms go through something similar, we decided to start The Moms Co. We were clear that our products would have to be something that we could use ourselves, confidently and fearlessly. We would like to welcome you to the family. With love and warmth, Malika and Mohit.At The Moms Co. our products are Made with Love and Without Compromise. We have brought in experts from across the world to help us create the safest natural formulations that are certified toxin free. With Mother Nature making her presence felt very strongly, everything we create retains the good and rejects the bad to give you a product that is as pure as mother’s love.3 years in the making, it's been an experience to find and work with many partners who are willing to raise the bar on products that are available in the Indian market. We are very grateful to each of our mentors and supporters for believing in us, and working tirelessly with us to create products that the Indian mom deserves - products that she can confidently believe are Made Without Compromise.

description: At Simple, we’re all about making products which are kind to skin and have skin-loving ingredients. All our products are free from colour, perfume, and a strict list of 2000+ harsh chemicals (we call them baddies). Simple Vitamin C+E+F Booster Face Serum is our most advanced innovation till date which supercharges the skin with triple Vitamin C, E and F. It is potent yet kind to skin and gives instant glow without irritation. The multi-vitamin infusion provides youthful glowing skin, strengthens skin barrier and moisturisation with every use. Its non-greasy and non-sticky formula penetrates deeply into the skin to brighten dull complexion and improve uneven skin tone. Simple Vitamin C+E+F Booster Face Serum with the goodness of Vitamin C also acts as anti-aging product which reduces age spots and helps give spotless skin. It is 95% naturally derived and 91% biodegradable to make sure the face serum is strong yet kind to your skin. Specially designed for sensitive skin users with pH. of 5.5-6.5, it is Dermatologically tested and approved, Hypoallergenic and Non-Comedogenic. This face serum is also suitable for oily, dry and combination skin for both men and women. How to Use - Cleanse your face with a facewash and pat dry. Take a pea sized amount of the Simple Booster Serum in your palm. Spread it between your palms without rubbing too much. Dab the serum all over your face and neck using small and gentle tapping motions. Follow with the Simple Moisturiser. For best results, use daily. With more than 50 years of heritage in caring for the most sensitive skin, Simple, UK's No.1 facial skincare brand, is all about making products which are kind to skin, animals, and planet. We make sure that we respect your skin, always, and that’s why all our products are tested even on the most sensitive skin. Our Products are gentle. Our products are Simple!
